about_the_game:
About This Game

Tumultus is a chaotic 1-4 player co-op game that blends strategy, action, and rebellion into an adrenaline-fueled fight for freedom. Team up with friends to outwit relentless oppressors, complete daring objectives, and keep the spirit of resistance alive in a world that’s determined to crush you.

Unite. Resist. Survive.

Dive into dynamic environments—from urban streets to hazardous industrial zones—where every map challenges your teamwork and creativity. Your mission: disrupt the system by hacking, sabotaging, and building barricades while evading increasingly aggressive enemies.

But beware: if all players are captured, the rebellion fails. Rescue your allies, adapt your tactics, and keep fighting for freedom.

Key Features

  • Co-Op Chaos: Join forces with 1-3 other players in high-stakes, fast-paced gameplay where teamwork is the ultimate weapon.

  • Dynamic Objectives: Hack supply chains, sabotage critical infrastructure, and hold the line with barricades—all while staying one step ahead of the oppressors.

  • Creative Resistance: Build barricades to slow down enemies, throw improvised projectiles like bricks and paint bombs, and disrupt their tactics. Every action counts.

  • High-Stakes Gameplay: Get caught, and you’re sent to jail—rely on your team to break you free or risk the collapse of the entire rebellion.

  • Unique Environments: Explore a variety of maps with distinct challenges, from sprawling urban centers to treacherous industrial sites. Each location demands fresh strategies and creative thinking.

  • Attacks from Oppressors: Face off against the oppressors who will try to stop you with a variation of tactics inspired by real-world crowd control, keeping every encounter intense and unpredictable.

Will You Rise or Fall?

Whether you’re sneaking through alleyways, holding your ground behind a barricade, or rescuing a teammate from the clutches of the oppressors, every moment in Tumultus is packed with tension and excitement.

Unite. Resist. Fight for freedom. The revolution starts now

name: Tumultus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650/GTX 1050-ti, or AMD RX 470/RX 570, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X﻿ or ﻿i5-12400 ﻿or equivalent performance, 6 physical cores minimum
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070﻿ or RX 5700, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Tumultus is a co-op game of rebellion. Complete daring objectives, evade relentless oppressors, and rescue captured teammates. Build barricades, throw improvised projectiles, and fight for freedom. Unite, resist, and rise—or fall as the movement crumbles.
